plot: When his father dies, rodeo star Dan Bennett returns to his ranch but hires on as a ranch hand. A horse known as the White Outlaw is the leader of a herd of wild horses and Dan's obsession now is to capture and tame that horse. Foreman Christine Johnson learns of his true identity and that he plans to sell the ranch after taming the horse. Her objective now becomes to keep him from selling and she starts by releasing the White Outlaw he has just captured.   Written by  Maurice VanAuken
title: Northwest Stampede

write.role: (suggested by the Saturday Evening Post article &"Wild Horse Roundup&" by)
write.name: Jean Muir
